artifact.title: SoccerSum: Multimodal AI-Based Summarization and Storytelling for Soccer on Social Media

contrib.bio: Mehdi is currently pursuing a Masters degree in Applied Computer and Information Technology at Oslo Metropolitan University, with a specialized research interest in the application of AI and technology in the field of sports. His academic journey is complemented by a strong foundation in Mathematics and mathematical modeling, which aids in their exploration of innovative solutions within the intersection of artificial intelligence and sports industry

general_inst.software_dependencies: Python (Version 3.11), Flask, re, torch, torchvision, ultralytics, cv2, numpy, requests, openai, whisper, librosa, sklearn.feature_extraction.text, sklearn.metrics.pairwise, matplotlib, mpl_toolkits.mplot3d
general_inst.hardware_dependencies: Tested on Linux-based systems. Requires at least 1 GPU with 4 GB VRAM for optimal performance.
general_inst.installation: Clone the repository: git clone https://github.com/simula/SoccerSum Install dependencies: Navigate to the SoccerSum folder and run pip install -r requirements.txt Download and set up model weights: Download from https://huggingface.co/SimulaMet-HOST/SoccerSum and place in the weights folder.
general_inst.other_instructions: Ensure that port 5000 on your machine is available for the Flask application. OPENAI API Access Token is required for GPT-4 integration. Demonstration video can be found under: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=za4VIi2ARXY

experimental_inst.installation: Standard installation through the provided GitHub repository and requirement files.
experimental_inst.parameterization: File paths and API tokens need to be set as per user environment.
experimental_inst.worksflow: Run the Flask application using python3 app.py and access the GUI in a web browser. Provide a Goal event file path (MP4 or M3U8 URL) for processing.
experimental_inst.evaluation: SoccerSUM GUI processes a 30-second goal event clip in approximately 1 minute. Larger clips require additional time. System shows progress on the GUI sidebar.
